"Computable index" Widget
The "Computable index" Widget is used for displaying the value of a calculated indicator in the profile.
Example of a customized widget:
To add a widget, go to the "Widgets" tab, select the "Computable index" element and drop it to the workspace.
To display data, select a calculated indicator (configured earlier,
Create and configure calculated indicators
) from the drop-down list.
Thus, the visual form will display:
indicator name as field name;
possibility to display historical values by
icon;
possibility to display value changes chart by
icon;
computable index value.
To display data, make sure the calculated indicators of the given object/profile are in the database. The calculation is made within the
calculation methodology
.
